name: junkyard-map
description: A map application for self-service junkyards

scripts.install-all: npm install; cd client; npm install
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && npm install typescript @types/express @types/cors @types/morgan @types/node && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../server/public && cp -r build/* ../server/public/
